name: part_011
file: tmp_【#myth4EVER】hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Concert： The Show Goes On! [CDljbqawDkw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: MC segment where the members of hololive English -Myth- share their thoughts on their 4th anniversary.
Performance of the song 'Connect the World'.

subtitles.original: Gimme, gimme, gimme something wholesome, come on!
subtitles.english: Gimme, gimme, gimme something wholesome, come on!

subtitles.original: Fine, fine, fine. I love singing
subtitles.english: Fine, fine, fine. I love singing

subtitles.original: songs that I love with people that I love.
subtitles.english: songs that I love with people that I love.

subtitles.original: That's it. That's all there is to it.
subtitles.english: That's it. That's all there is to it.

subtitles.original: I had a lot of fun with you guys. You guys are the best.
subtitles.english: I had a lot of fun with you guys. You guys are the best.

subtitles.original: And, uh, yeah, before I get too sappy,
subtitles.english: And, uh, yeah, before I get too sappy,

subtitles.original: somebody else take the mic. I think we all have

subtitles.original: Kiara, what did you think?
subtitles.english: Kiara, what did you think?

subtitles.original: Yes! Well, today I did a little bit of MCing here.
subtitles.english: Yes! Well, today I did a little bit of MCing here.

subtitles.original: But for me, you know, I realized,
subtitles.english: But for me, you know, I realized,

subtitles.english: were around like four years, right?

subtitles.english: Four years into the game.

subtitles.original: And now, we're four years in!
subtitles.english: And now, we're four years in!

subtitles.original: Wow, so we're old!
subtitles.english: Wow, so we're old!

subtitles.original: We're like really proper senpais now.
subtitles.english: We're like really proper senpais now.

subtitles.original: And everybody, you gotta respect us, pay the senpai tax.
subtitles.english: And everybody, you gotta respect us, pay the senpai tax.

subtitles.original: Pay up!
subtitles.english: Pay up!

subtitles.original: Pay up please!
subtitles.english: Pay up please!

subtitles.original: So all of these four years, hopefully more, and
subtitles.english: So all of these four years, hopefully more, and

subtitles.original: you know, I want to make more memories.
subtitles.english: you know, I want to make more memories.

subtitles.original: This was definitely a big, nice memory.
subtitles.english: This was definitely a big, nice memory.

subtitles.original: So the show must go on, the show goes on indeed,

subtitles.original: just like the title.
subtitles.english: just like the title.
